overview: In Brest, Teddy explores the underground of the city with his electronic music, Mireille prepares concerts in the squat of the rue de Saint-Malo, David rehearses his melancholic songs, the rappers record in their studio and at night the punk bands make the city dance. Together they tell us the story of Brest, its identity, its soul. That of a popular city at the end of the world.
title: Le chant de Brest
